# Body

**Associated Type**

A view that represents the body of a product view.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Body : View
```

## Creating custom product views

- **makeBody(configuration:)**: Creates a view that represents the body of a product view.
- **ProductViewStyle.Configuration**: A type that represents the properties of a product view style.

items.description: Creates a view that represents the body of a product view.
